services.name: Full Planning + Design Package
services.description: Let us take the wedding planning stress off your shoulders and walk you through the entire process, start to finish. We focus on your style, create your vision, and curate all the details in between.

included: Timeline Creation + Vendor Confirmations and Communication
Design Mock Up Meeting with All Design Elements
Unlimited Access to Lucky Day Rentals
Monthly Check In Calls to Stay on Track
Assemble + Mail All Stationery (Save the Dates + Invitations)
Inquire and Negotiate All Vendor Contracts
Online Client Access Full Set of Guides
Gift of Online Pre-Marital Courses by Happily Ever After
